channel.title: Gaming on Technology with Safi
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on Technology with Safi

item.title: My top 5 favorite Free and Open Source Video Games
item.description: This is the list of my top 5 most favorite Free and Open Source Video Games

item.title: How to Install Wine on Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye 64-bit
item.description: Installing Wine and running classic Windows games on Raspberry Pi 64-bit is a bit tricky but it can be done through my guide easily.

item.title: How to Install Box86 and Box64 on Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye 64-bit
item.description: Box86 and Box64 are great x86 and x86_64 compatibility layers for ARM-based SBCs including Raspberry Pi. I will guide you on how to install them both at the same time on Raspberry Pi OS bullseye 64-bit.

item.title: One of my favorite FOSS game Scorched 3D
item.description: Scorched 3D is a turn-based 3D artillery game inspired by the old MS-DOS title of Scorched Earth. The game is an extremely addictive game.

item.title: How to run SuperTuxKart properly on your Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye
item.description: How to run SuperTux Kart properly without the missing graphics on Raspberry Pi OS Bullseye (64-bit) running on Raspberry Pi 4 and Raspberry Pi 400.
